metadata.description: Primary location for all resources e.g. eastus
The name of Dev Center e.g. dc-devbox-test
The name of Dev Center project e.g. dcprj-devbox-test
The name of Network Connection e.g. con-devbox-test
The name of Dev Center user identity
The subnet resource id if the user wants to use existing subnet
The name of the Virtual Network e.g. vnet-dcprj-devbox-test-eastus
the subnet name of Dev Box e.g. default
The vnet address prefixes of Dev Box e.g. 10.4.0.0/16
The subnet address prefixes of Dev Box e.g. 10.4.0.0/24
The user or group id that will be granted to Devcenter Dev Box User and Deployment Environments User role
The type of principal id: User or Group
The name of Azure Compute Gallery
The name of Azure Compute Gallery image definition
The name of image template for customized image
The name of image offer
The name of image publisher
The name of image sku
The personal access token of Github/ADO repo
The catalog repository URL of ADE templates
The root path of catalog repository including ADE templates
The name of the Virtual Network
the app subnet name of Dev Box
The address prefixes of the vnet
The subnet address prefixes for Dev Box
The location of the resource
The tags that will be associated to the Resources

properties.accessPolicies: [if(not(empty(parameters('principalId'))), createArray(createObject('objectId', parameters('principalId'), 'permissions', createObject('secrets', createArray('get', 'list')), 'tenantId', subscription().tenantId)), createArray())]

metadata.description: The value of the secret. Provide only derived values like blob storage access, but do not hard code any secrets in your templates

properties.description: Image Builder access to create resources for the image build, you should delete or split out as appropriate

parameters.devcenterName: [if(not(empty(parameters('devcenterName'))), createObject('value', parameters('devcenterName')), createObject('value', format('{0}{1}', variables('abbrs').devcenter, variables('resourceToken'))))]
parameters.projectName: [if(not(empty(parameters('projectName'))), createObject('value', parameters('projectName')), createObject('value', format('{0}{1}', variables('abbrs').devcenterProject, variables('resourceToken'))))]
